KnowledgeItem.Title: DeployWarWorkflow
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for deploying war on remote Tomcat server by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock DeployWarWorkflow and the necessary information for successful completion of workflow.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${DWW:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created				
				Host=${DWW:Host}
				User=${DWW:User}
				TomcatUser=${DWW:TomcatUser}
				TomcatPassword=${DWW:TomcatPassword}
				TomcatPort=${DWW:TomcatPort}
				WarPath='${DWW:WarPath}'
				ContextPath='${DWW:ContextPath}'
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				Lib=RUNLOCALCOMMAND
				Command='sudo curl -T "${DWW:WarPath}" "http://${DWW:Host}:${DWW:Port}/manager/text/deploy?path=/${DWW:ContextPath}" --user ${DWW:TomcatUser}:${DWW:Password}'
				CurrentState=ReadState
				/> </NewBlock>
